articles.title: Russia-Ukraine War News: Live Updates
articles.description: The U.N.’s nuclear watchdog has assembled a team of experts to visit the Zaporizhzhia plant as early as next week. Shelling and power disruptions there have raised concerns of a nuclear accident.
articles.content:
Ukrainian emergency rescue teams, during a nuclear disaster drill in Zaporizhzhia.Credit...David Guttenfelder for The New York Times

articles.title: Father, son clinging to cooler rescued from Boston Harbor
articles.description: The men said their boat’s 28-foot engine got tangled in lobster lines and failed. The current pushed the boat onto the rocks and punctured the hull, police said.
